verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cause me to come
To Thy river oh Lord
Cause me to come
To Thy river oh Lord
Cause me to come
To Thy river oh Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cause me to come
Cause me to drink
Cause me to dwell

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cause me to drink
From Thy river oh Lord
(x3)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Cause me to dwell
by Thy river oh Lord
(x3)
